did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Bryan Ward Tichenor was an attorney, stenographer, notary public, and court reporter of the First Judicial District, Arizona Territory. This collection includes a holograph and typescript correspondence, both personal and professional, chiefly relates to amounts owed him for his services.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Correspondence of Bryan Ward Tichenor (AZ 130). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Attorney, stenographer, notary public, and court reporter of the First Judicial District, Arizona Territory, 1887-1896.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in chronological arrangement.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph and typescript correspondence, both personal and professional, chiefly relates to amounts owed him for his services.

item.corpname: Arizona. District Court (1st Judicial District, Pima County)
